name: Starlight Tailor
description:
A short visual novel about making a dress.

Marie's friend Eliza is getting married soon,  but Marie has yet to acquire something to wear. Help her make a dress in time for the wedding, as well as overcome her fears.

playtime is about 20 - 30 minutes.

Created by P4Guin, using music by TERNOX.

If you play, please feel free to leave a comment with feedback, I would love to hear your thoughts!
